snippet.textDisplay: Aiyyaa was a milestone , it exerted woman protagonist's  love and sexual drive for the male partner .  The song was happening in her dream , so it was raw . I see no  other way to do the song , we Indians are hypocrites , sexual dream/wishes of a woman is taboo .
snippet.textOriginal: Aiyyaa was a milestone , it exerted woman protagonist's  love and sexual drive for the male partner .  The song was happening in her dream , so it was raw . I see no  other way to do the song , we Indians are hypocrites , sexual dream/wishes of a woman is taboo .

snippet.textDisplay: @Irfan sir : Hello from a very far land. Just came across your show here on youtube. You doing a great job. It's a pure and genuine show. The overall aura/feeling of this show somehow makes me feel that I have gone back to 90's days. Perfect questions for a perfect candidate. Not many artists deserve to be a candidate for this show. But you're choosing right people. They've done a great job in their field. They have given us many lifetime moments and they are very genuine while they answer your questions. Their speak their heart out.
snippet.textOriginal: @Irfan sir : Hello from a very far land. Just came across your show here on youtube. You doing a great job. It's a pure and genuine show. The overall aura/feeling of this show somehow makes me feel that I have gone back to 90's days. Perfect questions for a perfect candidate. Not many artists deserve to be a candidate for this show. But you're choosing right people. They've done a great job in their field. They have given us many lifetime moments and they are very genuine while they answer your questions. Their speak their heart out.
